reason: Letter starts with 'Hofheim, den 27.2.50. Liebe Leut!'. The first page ends with 'Meiner Meinung nach sind'. The second page starts with 'die hier von Oestlau noch nicht so fort- schrittlich', which continues the topic of agricultural practices mentioned on the first page (cutting berries). The content about Herr Betzel's farm connects the two pages.
